ygData.subject: Re: Tooting flutes (was: Re: Char Catillion)
ygData.msgSnippet: Subject: Re: Tooting flutes (was: Re: [eqbards] Char Catillion) ... flute, ... It could be that it affected the first faction adjustment - dubious to
ygData.messageBody:
Subject: Re: Tooting flutes (was: Re: [eqbards] Char Catillion)


> > carrilon also, once I used it on a dubious and didn't get my flute
> > equipped before pulse, and she was only indifferent. Repulsed with
flute,
> > and she was amiable.
>
> I definitely need to test this again, because the flute made no
> difference whatsoever in any faction adjustments when I used it
> in the past. Dubious to amiable? Are you sure? That's a bit
> much.
>
> Harmonic.

It could be that it affected the first faction adjustment - dubious to
indifferent, next pulse flute is equipped = indifferent to amiable. Might be
something to try when testing - see if you can bump it up twice? first dose
of the song without the flute, second dose with it?? Just an idea. heh

Brangwen Incantare <New Outriders>
L24, Lady Wood Elf Bard, The Rathe
============================
